decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  988/X01, 988/X03, 988/OD03, Design and Access Statement, Received 27 October 2017 988/OD04, Flood Risk Assessment Received 09 November 2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to the occupation of the development, full details of the cycle storage detailing the layout and shelter for the cycle spaces required by the site should be submitted and approved by the local authority. The spaces shall be built out as approved.

Condition : 4 - Prior to the occupation of the site, the addresses of the units hereby The development shall not be occupied until arrangements have been
agreed in writing with the local planning authority and put in place to
ensure that, with the exception of disabled persons, no resident of the
development shall obtain a resident's parking permit within any
controlled parking zone which may be in force in the area at any time.
description: Creation of two additional self-contained units and additional communal and management facilities following the removal of existing rear extension with alterations to the rear elevation and internally.  Installation of new fence to boundary with 51 Barrowgate Road.
